info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, Geauga, east central Cuyahoga, Lake, northeastern Summit and western Ashtabula Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chardon to near South Russell to near Akron. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Painesville, Ravenna, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Cuyahoga Falls, Mentor, Kent, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Geneva, South Russell, Madison, Middlefield and Garrettsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
